price: Hakika Mlinzi wangu ni Mwenyezi Mungu aliye teremsha Kitabu. Naye ndiye awalindae walio wema.
arabic: إِنَّ وَلِـِّۧيَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَۖ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
footnotes: Hakika msaidizi wangu wa kuninusuru nanyi ni Yeye Mwenyezi Mungu. Ulinzi wangu uko kwake. Naye ndiye aliye niteremshia Qur'ani. Na Yeye peke yake ndiye anaye wanusuru waja wake walio wema.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna waliyyiya al-lahu alladhī nazzala al-kitāba wahuwa yatawallā al-ṣāliḥīna
